metadata.title: CVE-2017-6001 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Race condition in kernel/events/core.c in the Linux kernel before 4.9.7allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted application that makesconcurrent perf_event_open system calls for moving a software group into ahardware context.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incompletefix for CVE-2016-6786.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-lowlatency - 6.8.0-31.31.1

No subscription required
